name: Fire Punch (Revolution Game)
description:
In Fire Punch play as the guardian of the crystal ring.
However, your skill isn't decent enough to kill hoards of enemies targeting the ring. So you release your fire punch and throw 'em into the void!

Submitted in Indiepocalypse Issue #37 (Paying Anthology), ANUAL GAME JAM! Jan to Dec! 2022, World Gamer Organization 2022 and World Gamer Organization 2023

Check this out maybe
